directions: Blend first 8 ingredients in processor until almost smooth. Gradually add oil and process until thick dressing forms. Season with salt and pepper. (Can be prepared 1 day ahead. Cover and refrigerate.)

Toss mushrooms with 1/3 cup dressing in medium bowl. Let marinate 15 minutes. Place lettuce in large bowl. Add mushrooms, croutons and cheese. Toss with enough dressing to coat generously. Season salad with salt and pepper.
ingredients: 2 dashes of hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco)
1 large head romaine lettuce, torn into bite-size pieces
title: Mushroom Caesar Salad
